name: Speed Racer (itch)
description:
Speed Racer - a 2 Player Racing Game

DISCLAIMER: The web version is lower quality in terms of graphics so if you want the nicer experience download the file below the web version.

Either play the racing mode, go against your friend and the AI or challenge yourself with the fuel mode and race without emptying your tank.

Made in a 1 Week Challenge

Controls: Mouse for Menu, WASD for Player1 (blue car) and arrow keys for Player2 (red car)

Supports Controllers too.
